trans-unit.target: 「熄灭宫灯时不出言祈祷，会带来坏运。虽然灯火只能烤焦东西，但其灵魂却能不断地对房子展开报复。」 ～八尾半的教诲

trans-unit.resname: CHK·33 | Masako the Humorless | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Masako the Humorless
trans-unit.target: 老古板昌子

trans-unit.resname: CHK·33 | Masako the Humorless | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may play CARDNAME any time you could play an instant.\nTapped creatures you control may block as though they were untapped.
trans-unit.target: 你可以于你能够使用瞬间的时机下，使用CARDNAME。你可以把由你操控且已横置的生物视同未横置地进行阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·33 | Masako the Humorless | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Konda's servants dared not neglect their duties for a moment under Masako's icy gaze, knowing that what she saw, Lord Konda would hear.
trans-unit.target: 在昌子的冷眼监督下，今田家臣从不敢怠忽职守，因为她双眼所见之事，今田城主都会知道。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·34 | Mothrider Samurai | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 翔蛾武士

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play with a divinity counter on it if you played it from your hand.\nCARDNAME is indestructible as long as it has a divinity counter on it.\nRemove a divinity counter from CARDNAME: Destroy each other creature.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进场时，若你从手上使用之，则其上有一个神威指示物。 只要CARDNAME上面有神威指示物，便不会毁坏。 从CARDNAME上移去一个神威指示物：消灭所有其他的生物。

trans-unit.target: 武士道1（每当它进行阻挡或被阻挡时，它得+1/+1直到回合结束。） 每当CARDNAME攻击时，由你操控的武士得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Remove target creature from the game. At end of turn, return that creature to play under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

trans-unit.resname: CHK·37 | Otherworldly Journey | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The landscape shimmered and I felt a chill breeze. When my vision cleared, I found myself alone among the corpses of my fallen friends."\n—Journal found in Numai
trans-unit.target: 「地表闪烁光芒，一阵寒风袭来。等我看清四周时，发现自己独身一人，旁边尽是朋友的尸体。」～遗留在沼居的日记

trans-unit.target: 虔敬狐僧

trans-unit.resname: CHK·38 | Pious Kitsune | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a devotion counter on CARDNAME. Then if a creature named Eight-and-a-Half-Tails is in play, you gain 1 life for each devotion counter on CARDNAME.\n{T}, Remove a devotion counter from CARDNAME: You gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，在CARDNAME上放置一个奉献指示物。然后若场上有名称为八尾半的生物，则CARDNAME上每有一个奉献指示物，你就获得1点生命。 {T}，从CARDNAME上移去一个奉献指示物：你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·39 | Quiet Purity | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标结界。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·39 | Quiet Purity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When the Kami of Utter Silence passes, walls lose their secrets. Scrolls lose their lessons. Tapestries lose their beauty. Where there was meaning, there is only stillness."\n—Sensei Hisoka
trans-unit.target: 「至静神所经之处，墙垣无所掩蔽，卷轴失其智识，挂毯褪尽光华。意义原居之处，而今一片沉寂。」 ～密师范

trans-unit.source: "Just as the noble soul calls virtue to itself, the evil soul summons harm."\n—Teachings of Eight-and-a-Half-Tails
trans-unit.target: 「正如高贵灵魂寻求美德，邪恶灵魂也召来伤害。」 ～八尾半的教诲

trans-unit.target: 记忆的重担远比老去可怕。年轻修行僧失去青春，还替他人承受整辈子的艰困与苦痛。

trans-unit.target: 「太阳神让人看了就害怕。他生气时，最好快快躲好并祈求原谅。」 ～金尾师范

trans-unit.target: 「智慧不是去计数瀑布中有多少水滴，而是学习为何水要奔向土地。」

trans-unit.resname: CHK·62 | Gifts Ungiven | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻四张名称各不相同的牌并展示之。目标对手在其中选择两张。将这两张牌置入你的坟墓场，其余的置入你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·63 | Graceful Adept | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Graceful Adept
trans-unit.target: 优雅名师

trans-unit.resname: CHK·63 | Graceful Adept | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You have no maximum hand size.
trans-unit.target: 你的手牌数量没有上限。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·63 | Graceful Adept | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When you have mastered my lessons, it will seem as though the whole of the world has opened up to your mind and nothing is beyond your grasp."\n—Lady Azami
trans-unit.target: 「当你完全通达了这些学问，整个世界将为你开启，万物皆在掌握之中。」 ～蓟夫人

trans-unit.resname: CHK·64 | Guardian of Solitude | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Guardian of Solitude
trans-unit.target: 孤寂守卫

trans-unit.resname: CHK·64 | Guardian of Solitude | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you play a Spirit or Arcane spell, target creature gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你使用精怪或古咒咒语时，目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·64 | Guardian of Solitude | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It seemed an easy thing, to step into the nothingness, to fall, to die. But then, for an instant, I saw it, eyes filled with endless sorrow, and I turned back to face my pain."\n—Snow-Fur, kitsune poet
trans-unit.target: 「一切显得如此轻易：步入寂寥，坠落，死去；但那一瞬我见到它，与眼底的无尽哀伤。于是我回过头来，重新面对所经历的痛苦。」 ～狐诗人雪毛

trans-unit.resname: CHK·65 | Hinder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hinder
trans-unit.target: 阻碍

trans-unit.resname: CHK·65 | Hinder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. If it's countered this way, put that card on the top or bottom of its owner's library instead of that player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。若该咒语以此法被反击，则改为将之置于其拥有者的牌库顶或牌库底，而非置入其拥有者的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·65 | Hinder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Do not react to force in kind. Turn it aside. Direct it to where it can do no harm."\n—Meloku the Clouded Mirror
trans-unit.target: 「勿以横暴回敬强蛮；应将其导引至无害之处。」 ～昙镜梅洛古

trans-unit.resname: CHK·66 | Hisoka, Minamo Sensei | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hisoka, Minamo Sensei
trans-unit.target: 水面院密师范

trans-unit.resname: CHK·66 | Hisoka, Minamo Sensei | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}, Discard a card: Counter target spell if it has the same converted mana cost as the discarded card.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}，弃一张牌：若目标咒语与所弃之牌的总法术力费用相同，则反击之。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·66 | Hisoka, Minamo Sensei | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "By all rights we should have perished in the Kami War. Our perseverence is a tribute to mortal ingenuity. And perhaps a few forgotten secrets found in the nick of time."
trans-unit.target: 「吾人本应在逆神之战中全数败亡。我们能存在至今，便是对生灵智慧的致敬。而一些遭人遗忘的秘密能在关键时刻发挥作用，也是功不可没。」

trans-unit.resname: CHK·67 | Hisoka's Defiance | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hisoka's Defiance
trans-unit.target: 密师范的反抗

trans-unit.resname: CHK·67 | Hisoka's Defiance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target Spirit or Arcane spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标精怪或古咒咒语。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·67 | Hisoka's Defiance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "With every passing day, the kami shape our world to suit their will. I, for one, would not see them succeed."
trans-unit.target: 「日复一日，神明将吾辈世界依其欲改造。但，至少我自己，就不愿见此成真。」

trans-unit.resname: CHK·68 | Hisoka's Guard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hisoka's Guard
trans-unit.target: 密师范护卫

trans-unit.resname: CHK·68 | Hisoka's Guard | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may choose not to untap CARDNAME during your untap step.\n{1}{U}, {T}: As long as CARDNAME remains tapped, target creature you control other than CARDNAME can't be the target of spells or abilities.
trans-unit.target: 你可选择于你的重置步骤中不重置CARDNAME。 {1}{U}，{T}：只要CARDNAME持续被横置，则目标由你操控，且不是CARDNAME的生物不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·69 | Honden of Seeing Winds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Honden of Seeing Winds
trans-unit.target: 清风本殿

trans-unit.resname: CHK·69 | Honden of Seeing Winds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card for each Shrine you control.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你每操控一个祭祠，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·69 | Honden of Seeing Winds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: To the sorrow of all, its winds found sin in the hearts of those who once learned from its wisdom.
trans-unit.target: 最令人哀痛的，是其清风竟转而判罚过往的修众。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·70 | Jushi Apprentice | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jushi Apprentice
trans-unit.target: 学徒术士

trans-unit.resname: CHK·70 | Jushi Apprentice | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}, {T}: Draw a card. If you have nine or more cards in hand, flip CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}，{T}：抓一张牌。若你的手牌有九张或更多，则将CARDNAME倒转。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·70 | Tomoya the Revealer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tomoya the Revealer
trans-unit.target: 示现师智也

trans-unit.resname: CHK·70 | Tomoya the Revealer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}{U}{U}, {T}: Target player draws X cards, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
trans-unit.target: {3}{U}{U}，{T}：目标牌手抓X张牌，X为你的手牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·71 | Kami of Twisted Reflection | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kami of Twisted Reflection
trans-unit.target: 曲映神

trans-unit.resname: CHK·71 | Kami of Twisted Reflection | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：将目标由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·71 | Kami of Twisted Reflection | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Its form reflected humanity as it stood during the Kami War: disjointed, confused, and incomplete.
trans-unit.target: 其外型正反映了逆神之战时的人性：散乱，困惑，无主。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·72 | Keiga, the Tide Star | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Keiga, the Tide Star
trans-unit.target: 苍龙京河

trans-unit.resname: CHK·72 | Keiga, the Tide Star | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, gain control of target creature.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME从场上进入坟墓场时，获得目标生物的操控权。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·73 | Lifted by Clouds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lifted by Clouds
trans-unit.target: 腾云驾雾

trans-unit.resname: CHK·73 | Lifted by Clouds | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.\nSplice onto Arcane {1}{U} (As you play an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)
trans-unit.target: 目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。 通联古咒{1}{U}（于你使用古咒咒语时，你可以从你的手上展示此牌，并支付其通联费用。若你如此作，则将此牌的效应加入该咒语中。）

trans-unit.resname: CHK·74 | Meloku the Clouded Mirror | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Meloku the Clouded Mirror
trans-unit.target: 昙镜梅洛古

trans-unit.resname: CHK·74 | Meloku the Clouded Mirror | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{1}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Put a 1/1 blue Illusion creature token with flying into play.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {1}，将由你操控的一个地移回其拥有者手上：将一个1/1蓝色，具有飞行异能的虚影衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·74 | Meloku the Clouded Mirror | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He loved his cities in the clouds. When he traveled to the lands below, he brought many reminders of his home.
trans-unit.target: 他钟爱自己的云端城市。每次出发至地面旅行，都随身带着许多家乡物品。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·75 | Myojin of Seeing Winds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Myojin of Seeing Winds
trans-unit.target: 清风明神

trans-unit.resname: CHK·75 | Myojin of Seeing Winds | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play with a divinity counter on it if you played it from your hand.\nCARDNAME is indestructible as long as it has a divinity counter on it.\nRemove a divinity counter from CARDNAME: Draw a card for each permanent you control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进场时，若你从手上使用之，则其上有一个神威指示物。 只要CARDNAME上面有神威指示物，便不会毁坏。 从CARDNAME上移去一个神威指示物：你每操控一个永久物，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·76 | Mystic Restraints | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mystic Restraints
trans-unit.target: 神秘管押

trans-unit.resname: CHK·76 | Mystic Restraints | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may play CARDNAME any time you could play an instant.\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, tap enchanted creature.\nEnchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
trans-unit.target: 你可以于你能够使用瞬间的时机下，使用CARDNAME。 当CARDNAME进场时，横置受此结界的生物。 受此结界的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·77 | Part the Veil | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Part the Veil
trans-unit.target: 分开水帘

trans-unit.resname: CHK·77 | Part the Veil | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return all creatures you control to their owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将所有由你操控的生物移回其拥有者的手上。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·77 | Part the Veil | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: At the waterfall, the border between the humanoid and the spirit worlds was weakest. The kami moved across it with ease and at will.
trans-unit.target: 实界与灵界的分野最薄之处就是瀑布，神明可轻易穿梭两界。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·78 | Peer Through Depths | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Peer Through Depths
trans-unit.target: 寻遍深水

trans-unit.resname: CHK·78 | Peer Through Depths | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的五张牌。你可以展示其中的一张瞬间或法术牌，并将其置于你手上。将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·79 | Petals of Insight | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Petals of Insight
trans-unit.target: 洞察花瓣

trans-unit.resname: CHK·79 | Petals of Insight | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may put those cards on the bottom of your library in any order. If you do, return CARDNAME to its owner's hand. Otherwise, draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌。你可以将这些牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。若你如此作，将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上。若你不如此作，则抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·80 | Psychic Puppetry | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Psychic Puppetry
trans-unit.target: 心灵操偶

trans-unit.resname: CHK·80 | Psychic Puppetry | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Tap or untap target permanent.\nSplice onto Arcane {U} (As you play an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)
trans-unit.target: 横置或重置目标永久物。 通联古咒{U}（于你使用古咒咒语时，你可以从你的手上展示此牌，并支付其通联费用。若你如此作，则将此牌的效应加入该咒语中。）

trans-unit.resname: CHK·81 | Reach Through Mists | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reach Through Mists
trans-unit.target: 探遍迷雾

trans-unit.resname: CHK·81 | Reach Through Mists | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·81 | Reach Through Mists | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Know one part of the name, obsession begins. Know two parts, paranoia sets in. Know three parts, madness descends. Know all, and only the kami know what will become of you."\n—Lady Azami
trans-unit.target: 「知道一部分，开始着迷；知道两部分，感到焦虑；知道三部分，逐渐疯狂；知道了全部，神才晓得你会变成什么样。」 ～蓟夫人

trans-unit.resname: CHK·82 | Reweave | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reweave
trans-unit.target: 重纺生命

trans-unit.resname: CHK·82 | Reweave | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target permanent's controller sacrifices it. That player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a card that shares a card type with the sacrificed permanent. The player puts that card into play, then shuffles his or her library.\nSplice onto Arcane {2}{U}{U}
trans-unit.target: 目标永久物的操控者将之牺牲。该牌手从其牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出与所牺牲之永久物有共通牌类别者为止。该牌手将该牌放置进场，然后将其牌库洗牌。 通联古咒{2}{U}{U}

trans-unit.resname: CHK·83 | River Kaijin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: River Kaijin
trans-unit.target: 河神

trans-unit.resname: CHK·83 | River Kaijin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Since the war began, fishermen don't sing to the kaijin to ask for full nets. They guard the shore with thrice-blessed spears, saving the nets for their wives to pack their belongings and leave."\n—Hayato, master sailor
trans-unit.target: 「打从战争开始以来，渔夫便不再歌颂海神以求满载而归。他们以三福长矛保卫沿岸，将网子交给妻小打包行李，之后离乡远行。」 ～老水手速人

trans-unit.resname: CHK·84 | Sift Through Sands | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sift Through Sands
trans-unit.target: 筛遍河砂

trans-unit.resname: CHK·84 | Sift Through Sands | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards, then discard a card.\nIf you played a spell named Peer Through Depths and a spell named Reach Through Mists this turn, you may search your library for a card named The Unspeakable, put it into play, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌，然后弃一张牌。 若你本回合中使用过名称为寻遍深水的咒语，以及名称为探遍迷雾的咒语，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张名称为忌话图的牌，并将其放置进场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·85 | Sire of the Storm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sire of the Storm
trans-unit.target: 风暴之父

trans-unit.resname: CHK·85 | Sire of the Storm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever you play a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当你使用精怪或古咒咒语时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·85 | Sire of the Storm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: This storm blows gales through the dreams of men.
trans-unit.target: 众生梦想为此风暴更添威势。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·86 | Soratami Cloudskater | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Soratami Cloudskater
trans-unit.target: 翔云空民

trans-unit.resname: CHK·86 | Soratami Cloudskater | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {2}，将由你操控的一个地移回其拥有者手上：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·86 | Soratami Cloudskater | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You hide your actions from eyes on the ground, but nothing escapes the clouds."
trans-unit.target: 「你避得开地上的眼睛，也逃不过天上的云。」

trans-unit.resname: CHK·87 | Soratami Mirror-Guard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Soratami Mirror-Guard
trans-unit.target: 镜卫空民

trans-unit.resname: CHK·87 | Soratami Mirror-Guard | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target creature with power 2 or less is unblockable this turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {2}，将由你操控的一个地移回其拥有者手上：目标力量等于或小于2的生物本回合中不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·88 | Soratami Mirror-Mage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Soratami Mirror-Mage
trans-unit.target: 镜咒空民

trans-unit.resname: CHK·88 | Soratami Mirror-Mage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{3}, Return three lands you control to their owner's hand: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {3}，将由你操控的三个地移回其拥有者手上：将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·88 | Soratami Mirror-Mage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The clouds obey my whims, and you'll obey theirs."
trans-unit.target: 「云听我号令，而你得听云的。」

trans-unit.resname: CHK·89 | Soratami Rainshaper | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Soratami Rainshaper
trans-unit.target: 雨雕空民

trans-unit.resname: CHK·89 | Soratami Rainshaper | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{3}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target creature you control can't be the target of spells or abilities this turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {3}，将由你操控的一个地移回其拥有者手上：目标由你操控的生物本回合不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·90 | Soratami Savant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Soratami Savant
trans-unit.target: 空民学者

trans-unit.resname: CHK·90 | Soratami Savant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{3}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {3}，将由你操控的一个地移回其拥有者手上：除非目标咒语的操控者支付{3}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·90 | Soratami Savant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "To prevent, one must first predict."
trans-unit.target: 「预见而后预防。」

trans-unit.resname: CHK·91 | Soratami Seer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Soratami Seer
trans-unit.target: 空民预言师

trans-unit.resname: CHK·91 | Soratami Seer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{4}, Return two lands you control to their owner's hand: Discard your hand, then draw that many cards.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {4}，将由你操控的两个地移回其拥有者手上：弃掉你的手牌，然后抓等量的牌。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·91 | Soratami Seer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Their mirrors show two worlds: that which is and that which should be.
trans-unit.target: 其镜映照两个世界：当下与未来。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·92 | Squelch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Squelch
trans-unit.target: 哑口无言

trans-unit.resname: CHK·92 | Squelch | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标起动式异能。（（法术力异能不能被反击） 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·92 | Squelch | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Oku-Doku had gone through all the motions: the same akki cursewords, the same ingredients with their horrid stink, the same rude gestures. Yet not a person died.
trans-unit.target: 欧库多库认真地比划着：同样的恶鬼脏话，同样的恶臭配方，同样的粗鲁姿势。依旧没人死掉。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·93 | Student of Elements | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Student of Elements
trans-unit.target: 元素门生

trans-unit.resname: CHK·93 | Student of Elements | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME has flying, flip it.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME具有飞行异能时，将它倒转。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·93 | Tobita, Master of Winds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tobita, Master of Winds
trans-unit.target: 驭风使鸢太

trans-unit.resname: CHK·93 | Tobita, Master of Winds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control have flying.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·94 | Swirl the Mists | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swirl the Mists
trans-unit.target: 迷雾涡漩

trans-unit.resname: CHK·94 | Swirl the Mists | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME comes into play, choose a color word.\nAll instances of color words on spells and permanents become the chosen color word.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进场时，选择一个颜色文字。 所有咒语与永久物上的所有颜色文字均成为该颜色文字。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·95 | Teller of Tales | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 「生灵并未全与神明作对。食人魔敬拜邪鬼，而一些人类也受空口白话之诱而订下盟约。」～神河通史

trans-unit.resname: CHK·154 | Akki Rockspeaker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The lava-proof shells of akki evolved over centuries, as akki pranks almost always got seriously out of hand.
trans-unit.target: 恶鬼的恶作剧经常弄得太过火，以致在长年演化下，其外皮已可抵抗高热岩浆。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·155 | Akki Underminer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Akki Underminer
trans-unit.target: 破坏恶鬼

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a permanent.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手牺牲一个永久物。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·155 | Akki Underminer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Deep inside the Sokenzan Mountains, a band of akki discovered a cache of ancient items of power. Their ensuing spree of destruction became known as 'The Three Days of Fun.'"\n—*Observations of the Kami War*
trans-unit.target: 「在霜剑山深处，有群恶鬼发现了许多强大无比的古代遗宝。他们为此纵乐乱闹所造成的破坏，后来称为『三日狂欢』。」～逆神之战侧记

trans-unit.resname: CHK·156 | Battle-Mad Ronin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Battle-Mad Ronin
trans-unit.target: 嗜杀浪人

trans-unit.resname: CHK·156 | Battle-Mad Ronin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Bushido 2 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.)\nCARDNAME attacks each turn if able.
trans-unit.target: 武士道2（每当它进行阻挡或被阻挡时，它得+2/+2直到回合结束。） CARDNAME每回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·156 | Battle-Mad Ronin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I fought fiercely, bravely, and without mercy. Had I not struck down my captain in the heat of battle, I might have become a hero instead of an outcast."
trans-unit.target: 「我在战场上可是勇猛无比，万夫莫敌。若没在激战时把队长给砍了，现在一定是个大英雄，而不是被放逐至今。」

trans-unit.resname: CHK·157 | Ben-Ben, Akki Hermit | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 恶鬼贤者班班

trans-unit.target: {T}：CARDNAME对目标进行攻击的生物造成伤害，其数量等同于由你操控且未横置之山脉的数量。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·157 | Ben-Ben, Akki Hermit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some akki thought of Ben-Ben as a kami of trickery in disguise. They hunted for him in the maze of warrens, often falling prey to his traps.
trans-unit.target: 有些恶鬼觉得班班的真实身分是诈术之神。他们在洞穴迷路间追杀班班，一路上落入其陷阱者不知凡几。

trans-unit.target: 重置目标非传奇的生物并获得其操控权直到回合结束。该生物获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·158 | Blind with Anger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I can post only the most honorable and strong-willed samurai to defend your stronghold. I have seen what can happen to lesser men."\n—General Takeno, letter to Lord Konda
trans-unit.target: 「我只愿以最重荣誉、意志坚定的武士替您防卫城塞。我深知非此不能成事。」 ～武野将军致今田城主

trans-unit.resname: CHK·159 | Blood Rites | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 「食人魔的血腥祭礼释放许多横行四方的邪鬼，让神明的威胁更加严重。」～逆神之战侧记

trans-unit.target: 此神明登上霜剑山，欲寻访熊野的秘密；整座山摇晃了两天，而后没人再见过这神明。

trans-unit.source: "It is the nature of humanity not to worry about tomorrow, especially when there's a good chance they won't live to see the end of today."\n—Kiku, Night's Flower

trans-unit.source: "It is true that we monks hold the key to paradise, but most don't understand that the paradise we guard is the one within."\n—Diary of Azusa
trans-unit.target: 「修行僧的确掌握了天堂的入口；但大多数人并不了解，我们所护卫的天堂就存于众生心中。」 ～梓纱的日记

trans-unit.resname: CHK·213 | Honden of Life's Web | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Honden of Life's Web
trans-unit.target: 大罗本殿

trans-unit.resname: CHK·213 | Honden of Life's Web | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token into play for each Shrine you control.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你每操控一个祭祠，便将一个1/1无色精怪衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·213 | Honden of Life's Web | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: To the sorrow of all, its web became a net that strangled those who helped weave it.
trans-unit.target: 最令人哀痛的，是其罗网竟转而窒息过往的织众。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·214 | Humble Budoka | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Humble Budoka
trans-unit.target: 谦敬武道家

trans-unit.resname: CHK·214 | Humble Budoka | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be the target of spells or abilities.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·214 | Humble Budoka | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Each time wanderers entered the forest seeking enlightenment, Dosan was there, waiting for them to arrive.
trans-unit.target: 每当云游人进入森林寻找开示，道三都会现身，等着他们来访。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·215 | Iname, Life Aspect | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Iname, Life Aspect
trans-unit.target: 否命生相

trans-unit.resname: CHK·215 | Iname, Life Aspect | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, you may remove CARDNAME from the game. If you do, return any number of target Spirit cards from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上进入坟墓场时，你可以将CARDNAME移出对战。若你如此作，将任意数量的目标精怪牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·215 | Iname, Life Aspect | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Iname rejoices in the dawn of a new life, but soon becomes jealous of the simple joys denied him by his station. So the cycle begins anew.
trans-unit.target: 否命因生命绽放而欢欣；紧接着又因无从经历，而忌妒起此等单纯喜悦。另一轮回于是展开。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·216 | Joyous Respite | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Joyous Respite
trans-unit.target: 欢畅歇息

trans-unit.resname: CHK·216 | Joyous Respite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You gain 1 life for each land you control.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个地，便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·216 | Joyous Respite | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I have been gifted by the kami with long life. So far, they have not seen fit to withdraw their gift. There may yet be a way to stop the killing without more blood, human or kami, being spilled."\n—Dosan the Falling Leaf
trans-unit.target: 「长寿神曾赐福给我。目前为止，他们应该还没有收回这项祝福。不论人或神的血都已经流得够多了，总会有方法结束这一切。」～落叶大师道三

trans-unit.resname: CHK·217 | Jugan, the Rising Star | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 碧龙珠眼

trans-unit.resname: CHK·217 | Jugan, the Rising Star | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, you may distribute five +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME从场上进入坟墓场时，将五个+1/+1指示物以任意方法分配至任意数量的目标生物上。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·218 | Jukai Messenger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jukai Messenger
trans-unit.target: 树海信驿

trans-unit.resname: CHK·218 | Jukai Messenger | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 树林行者

trans-unit.resname: CHK·218 | Jukai Messenger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Dosan's monks, deep in spiritual thought, could walk through the thickest of forests without leaving a mark, even the leaves beneath their feet unaffected by their passing.
trans-unit.target: 道三的修行僧经由深层灵思，可以穿过最厚实的树林而不留一丝痕迹，连脚底落叶都完好如初。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·219 | Kami of the Hunt | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kami of the Hunt
trans-unit.target: 狩猎神

trans-unit.resname: CHK·219 | Kami of the Hunt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you play a Spirit or Arcane spell, CARDNAME gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你使用精怪或古咒咒语时，CARDNAME得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·219 | Kami of the Hunt | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Don't worry, Jiro. The kami would never attack us this close to home . . . . Jiro?"\n—Hoto, temple guardian, last words
trans-unit.target: 「放心吧，次郎。神明就算要下手，也不会选那么靠近. . . .次郎？」～寺庙守卫法栋的临终语

trans-unit.resname: CHK·220 | Kashi-Tribe Reaver | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: CHK·220 | Kashi-Tribe Reaver | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.\n{1}{G}: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对生物造成战斗伤害时，横置该生物，且它于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。 {1}{G}：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·221 | Kashi-Tribe Warriors | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kashi-Tribe Warriors
trans-unit.target: 橡宗战士

trans-unit.resname: CHK·221 | Kashi-Tribe Warriors | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对生物造成战斗伤害时，横置该生物，且它于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·221 | Kashi-Tribe Warriors | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The orochi and the monks had always had an unspoken agreement: live and let live. But when the kami began raging, some warrior youths began questioning that agreement.
trans-unit.target: 蛇人与修行僧之间有个默契：和平共处。而随着神明之乱逐渐恶化，一些年轻战士开始质疑此默契。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·222 | Kodama of the North Tree | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kodama of the North Tree
trans-unit.target: 北树木灵

trans-unit.resname: CHK·222 | Kodama of the North Tree | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nCARDNAME can't be the target of spells or abilities.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 CARDNAME不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·222 | Kodama of the North Tree | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The monks of the North Tree rarely saw their kodama until the Kami War, when it woke like a slumbering, angry bear."\n—"Poem of the Five Trees"
trans-unit.target: 「在逆神之战以前，北树修行僧几乎没见过当地的木灵；它们觉醒后如同怒熊一般，却还带着睡意。」 ～「五木诗」

trans-unit.resname: CHK·223 | Kodama of the South Tree | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kodama of the South Tree
trans-unit.target: 南树木灵

trans-unit.resname: CHK·223 | Kodama of the South Tree | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you play a Spirit or Arcane spell, each other creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你使用精怪或古咒咒语时，直到回合结束，每个由你操控的其他生物便得+1/+1并获得践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·223 | Kodama of the South Tree | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The monks of the South Tree had always reveled beneath their kodama's friendly gaze. During the Kami War, this gaze became fierce and full of hate."\n—"Poem of the Five Trees"
trans-unit.target: 「南树修行僧的一举一动，当地的木灵都投以友善的眼光；而逆神之战既起，它们的眼光也变得愤怒而痛恨。」 ～「五木诗」

trans-unit.resname: CHK·224 | Kodama's Might | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 木灵之力

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.\nSplice onto Arcane {G} (As you play an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。 通联古咒{G}（于你使用古咒咒语时，你可以从你的手上展示此牌，并支付其通联费用。若你如此作，则将此牌的效应加入该咒语中。）

trans-unit.resname: CHK·225 | Kodama's Reach | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻两张基本地牌并展示之，将其中一张横置进场，另一张置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·225 | Kodama's Reach | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The land grows only where the kami will it."\n—Dosan the Falling Leaf
trans-unit.target: 「土地只能长出神明允许的东西。」 ～落叶大师道三

trans-unit.resname: CHK·226 | Lure | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lure
trans-unit.target: 诱饵

trans-unit.resname: CHK·226 | Lure | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.
trans-unit.target: 所有能够阻挡受此结界之生物的生物皆须阻挡之。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·226 | Lure | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Jukai Forest was known for its secrets, which drew in many wayfarers and wizards. But it was those same secrets that kept most of those seekers from ever being heard from again.
trans-unit.target: 神秘的树海吸引了许多旅者与法师前来探访。而树海的神秘也让这些人从此音讯沓然。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·227 | Matsu-Tribe Decoy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Matsu-Tribe Decoy
trans-unit.target: 松宗诱敌手

trans-unit.resname: CHK·227 | Matsu-Tribe Decoy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {2}{G}: Target creature blocks CARDNAME this turn if able.\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: {2}{G}：目标生物此回合中若能阻挡CARDNAME，则须阻挡之。 每当CARDNAME对生物造成战斗伤害时，横置该生物，且它于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·228 | Moss Kami | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.resname: CHK·228 | Moss Kami | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Kami manifest in the form of whatever they embody in the physical plane. Some tower in the shape of moss or bark, while others take forms beyond mortal imagining.
trans-unit.target: 神明以该时空中得以具现的方式显示形体。有些看似高大的树干或苔癣，其他的外貌则使凡人难以想像。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·229 | Myojin of Life's Web | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Myojin of Life's Web
trans-unit.target: 大罗明神

trans-unit.resname: CHK·229 | Myojin of Life's Web | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play with a divinity counter on it if you played it from your hand.\nCARDNAME is indestructible as long as it has a divinity counter on it.\nRemove a divinity counter from CARDNAME: Put any number of creature cards from your hand into play.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进场时，若你从手上使用之，则其上有一个神威指示物。只要CARDNAME上面有神威指示物，便不会毁坏。 从CARDNAME上移去一个神威指示物：将任意数量的生物牌从你手上放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·230 | Nature's Will | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nature's Will
trans-unit.target: 大自然之愿

trans-unit.resname: CHK·230 | Nature's Will | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, tap all lands that player controls and untap all lands you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个或更多由你操控的生物对牌手造成战斗伤害时，横置所有由该牌手操控的地，并重置所有由你操控的地。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·230 | Nature's Will | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Without the kami to speak to nature on our behalf, we must beg help from nature directly."\n—Seshiro the Anointed
trans-unit.target: 「我们无法让神明出面向大自然请命，只能自行请求大自然帮忙。」 ～蛇圣濑四郎

trans-unit.resname: CHK·231 | Orbweaver Kumo | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Orbweaver Kumo
trans-unit.target: 缠珠蜘蛛

trans-unit.resname: CHK·231 | Orbweaver Kumo | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME may block as though it had flying.\nWhenever you play a Spirit or Arcane spell, CARDNAME gains forestwalk until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME可以视同具有飞行异能地进行阻挡。 每当你使用精怪或古咒咒语时，CARDNAME获得树林行者异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·232 | Order of the Sacred Bell | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Order of the Sacred Bell
trans-unit.target: 圣钟教士团

trans-unit.resname: CHK·232 | Order of the Sacred Bell | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Our bodies are weak compared to those of the kami, our knowledge limited, and our magic poor. Yet we draw breath. That alone is reason to hope."
trans-unit.target: 「跟神明比起来，我们的肉体孱弱，知识浅薄，法术落后，但我们还活着。这就足以让我们怀抱希望。」

trans-unit.source: {2}{G}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green Snake creature token into play. If you control ten or more creatures, flip CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {2}{G}，{T}：将一个1/1绿色蛇衍生物放置进场。若你操控十个或更多生物，将CARDNAME倒转。

trans-unit.target: {G}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·234 | Orochi Leafcaller | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Only orochi hatched from eggs 'touched by the kami' may become shamans. These days, there are fewer and fewer new shamans being born."
trans-unit.target: 「从『被神碰过』的蛋中孵化的蛇人，才能成为祭师。近来新生的祭师已逐渐减少。」

trans-unit.resname: CHK·235 | Orochi Ranger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Orochi Ranger
trans-unit.target: 巡林蛇人

trans-unit.resname: CHK·235 | Orochi Ranger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对生物造成战斗伤害时，横置该生物，且它于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·235 | Orochi Ranger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The young come to me, confused. They have been taught to respect the kami, and now they must fight them? I do not know what to say."\n—Sachi, to her father
trans-unit.target: 「年轻一辈面带困惑地来向我请教。他们从小受的教诲便是崇敬神明，为何如今竟尔兴战？我不知该如何解释才好。」 ～纱千致其父

trans-unit.resname: CHK·236 | Orochi Sustainer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Orochi Sustainer
trans-unit.target: 护源蛇人

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{G}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·236 | Orochi Sustainer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Nothing is the same anymore. The forests are not as lush, the waters not as pure, the air not as clear. Without the kami to direct and sustain the forces of nature, it's only a matter of time before we feel their neglect."
trans-unit.target: 「一切都变了。森林不如往昔肥沃，流水不如往昔明澈，空气不如往昔清新。神明不再导引、维护大自然的各种力量，我们很快便将体会遭神遗弃的痛苦。」

trans-unit.resname: CHK·237 | Rootrunner | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 跑根快

trans-unit.resname: CHK·237 | Rootrunner | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: {G}{G}，牺牲CARDNAME：将目标地置于其拥有者的牌库顶。 转生3（当它从场上进入坟墓场时，你可以将目标总法术力费用等于或小于3的精怪牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。）

trans-unit.resname: CHK·238 | Sachi, Daughter of Seshiro | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 濑四郎之女纱千

trans-unit.source: Other Snakes you control get +0/+1.\nShamans you control have "{T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool."
trans-unit.target: 其他由你操控的蛇得+0/+1。 由你操控的祭师具有「{T}：加{G}{G}到你的法术力池中。」

trans-unit.resname: CHK·238 | Sachi, Daughter of Seshiro | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The warriors deal in poison and fangs. We shamans remember why our ancestors crawled with their bellies to the earth."
trans-unit.target: 「战士以毒液与锐牙战斗。我们祭师则记得为何老祖宗用肚子在地上爬。」

trans-unit.resname: CHK·239 | Sakura-Tribe Elder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sakura-Tribe Elder
trans-unit.target: 樱宗长老

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card into play tapped, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，并将之横置进场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·239 | Sakura-Tribe Elder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There were no tombstones in orochi territory. Slain warriors were buried with a tree sapling, so they would become a part of the forest after death.
trans-unit.target: 蛇人领土中没有墓碑。殉身战士埋骨苗木之下，即使亡故后仍是树林一份子。

trans-unit.target: 蛇皮

trans-unit.resname: CHK·240 | Serpent Skin | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: 你可以于你能够使用瞬间的时机下，使用CARDNAME。受此结界的生物得+1/+1。{G}：重生受此结界的生物。

trans-unit.resname: CHK·241 | Seshiro the Anointed | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: His family was the first to reach out to the human monks. He soon knew as many koans as he did blade strikes.
trans-unit.target: 濑四郎不仅勇猛善战，其家族也是最早与人类修行僧接触的；因此他也知道了许多公案。

trans-unit.source: Shisato, Whispering Hunter
